channel.title: lyrics on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in lyrics on Roy Tang

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Woke up to the sound of falling rain

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I need some time off from that emotion, some time to pick my heart up off the floor

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Saan ka nagtungo, tumila na ang ambon sana man lang naghintay kahit na konting sandali

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
“Well, I dreamt I saw you walking Up a hillside in the snow

Casting shadows on the winter sky

As you stood there counting crows

One for sorrow, two for joy

Three for girls and four for boys

Five for silver, six for gold

Seven for a secret never to be told”

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Sooooooooooooommmmmmmmmmmeeeeeeeeeebody once told me …

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Someday you will find me Caught beneath a landslide

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: “What’s there beyond sleep, eat, work in this cruel life? Ain’t there nothing else ‘round here but human strife?”

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: How many special people change? How many lives are living strange?

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: “All lies and jest, still a man hears what he wants to hear and disregards the rest” - Simon and Garfunkel

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Day after day

Leaving the past behind

Coming to terms

With stitches and burns and

Learning to fly again

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: And it may take some time to Patch me up inside But I can’t take it so I Run away and hide And I may find in time that You were always right

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: “Sometimes the world looks perfect Nothing to rearrange Sometimes you just Get a feeling like you need some kind of change”

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I wish I could go back to those fairy book tales, forget the real world awhile and sail the seas of the talking whales

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Wake up the dawn and ask her why A dreamer dreams she never dies Wipe that tear away now from your eye

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I watch you spin around in your highest heels, you are the best one of the best ones; we all look like we feel

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I can’t attempt to point you in her direction I was blinded by the look in her eyes If I had just followed through then I wouldn’t be calling you

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Do you have the time to listen to me whine, about nothing and everything all at once?

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I’m not the one who broke you, I’m not the one you should fear

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Anything less than the best is a felony

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Like a madman laughing at the rain - a little out of touch, a little insane - it’s just easier than dealing with the pain

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Lights will guide you home And ignite your bones And I will try to fix you

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Your eyes, they shine so bright I wanna save that light I can’t escape this now Unless you show me how

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: “As soon as you’re born you start dying, so you might as well have a good time” - Cake

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I wish I was like you, easily amused

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I gotta be honest i think you know we’re covered in lies and that’s okay

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: If I lay here if I just lay here would you lie with me and just forget the world

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Sometimes the world looks perfect, nothing to be arranged. Sometimes you just get a feeling like you need some kinda change

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: yes no maybe i dont know can you repeat the question

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Bawat panaginip na taglay ng iyong isipPalayain mo at ilipad tungong langitAng iyong tinig ay aawit

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Harapin mo magiting ang bagong awitin; ikaw ang liwanag sa dilim

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: it’s a mess, it’s a start, it’s a flawed work of art

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: what I really want to know is…are you gonna go my way?
